verses.verse: וַ֭יַּעַן <WH6030> Then answered בִּלְדַּ֥ד <WH1085> Bildad הַשֻּׁחִ֗י <WH7747> the Shuhite וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said
הַמְשֵׁ֣ל <WH4910> Dominion וָפַ֣חַד <WH6343> and fear עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> Who עֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> [are] with him he maketh שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם <WH7965> peace בִּמְרוֹמָֽיו׃ <WH4791> in his high places
הֲיֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> Is there מִ֭סְפָּר <WH4557> any number לִגְדוּדָ֑יו <WH1416> army וְעַל־ <WH5921> and מִ֝֗י <WH4310> any לֹא־ <WH3808> not יָק֥וּם <WH6965> arise אוֹרֵֽהוּ׃ <WH216> his light

וּמַה־ <WH4100> How יִּצְדַּ֣ק <WH6663> be justified אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <WH582> How then can man עִם־ <WH5973> with אֵ֑ל <WH410> God וּמַה־ <WH4100> How יִּ֝זְכֶּ֗ה <WH2135> he be clean יְל֣וּד <WH3205> [that is] born אִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> ess

הֵ֣ן <WH2005> If עַד־ <WH5704> even יָ֭רֵחַ <WH3394> Behold even to the moon וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> no יַאֲהִ֑יל <WH166> and it shineth וְ֝כוֹכָבִ֗ים <WH3556> not yea the stars לֹא־ <WH3808> no זַכּ֥וּ <WH2141> are not pure בְעֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> in his sight
אַ֭ף <WH637> How כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <WH582> How much less man רִמָּ֑ה <WH7415> maggot וּבֶן־ <WH1121> and the son אָ֝דָ֗ם <WH120> of man תּוֹלֵעָֽה׃ <WH8438> oppressor פ
